application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: Location: Rear Garden of 43 sections A & B1. Pear Tree Reduce height by 3m and lightly shape to balance. Formative prune & remove dead branches. Current height 9m: After proposed works 6m height and 4m spread. 2 Lime Tree Remove epicormic shoots and inspect lower trunk and root flare for any adversities. Lift canopy over neighbouring garage by 4m. Remove dead branches. Rear Garden of 43 sections C & D3. Apple Tree Pollard at 2m. (Poor form) to allow regeneration of new crown Current height 4m: After proposed works 2m height and 1m spread. 4. Horsechestnut a) Remove x 1 lowest branch growing over garden (Approx. 15cm in diameter). Raise low canopy by lifting all trailing branches by 5m to suitable points. Remove dead branches throughout crown. b) Supply & install a 4 tonne 'Cobra' flexible brace system between two main stems at approx. 18m to pre-empt possible main fork failure.
